title: Fix logo loading and product edit/delete functionality

requirements.text: Fix logo image (logo.dim_256x256.png) not loading in the navigation header by verifying the image path is correct and the file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image displays correctly in the navigation header
Image loads without 404 errors in browser console
Logo is visible on both desktop and mobile views

requirements.text: Implement edit functionality for products in the products tab, allowing modification of product details including name, type, price, and availability status

quotes: in products tab also i am not able to edit or delete the products

acceptanceCriteria: Edit button is visible for each product card
Clicking edit opens a dialog with current product details pre-filled
Changes to product details are saved to backend and reflected immediately in UI

requirements.text: Implement delete functionality for products in the products tab with confirmation dialog to prevent accidental deletion

quotes: in products tab also i am not able to edit or delete the products

acceptanceCriteria: Delete button is visible for each product card
Clicking delete shows confirmation dialog before proceeding
Successfully deleted products are removed from the UI immediately

constraints: Use existing ProductList component pattern from frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx
Follow the same edit/delete pattern used in SubscriptionList component
Maintain consistency with existing UI component library (shadcn)
nonGoals: Changing the overall product management UI layout
Modifying the recipe editing functionality which already exists
Altering the availability toggle feature which is working
